edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation
Class OTFullSimReceiverPreprocessUtil

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation.OTFullSimReceiverPreprocessUtil

public class OTFullSimReceiverPreprocessUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class execute the preprocess phase of OT's that achieve full simulation.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

Method Detail

preProcess

public static OTFullSimPreprocessPhaseValues preProcess(DlogGroup dlog,
                                                        ZKPOKProver zkProver,
                                                        Channel channel,
                                                        java.security.SecureRandom random)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        CheatAttemptException,
                                                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                        CommitValueException
Runs the preprocess phase of the protocol, where the receiver input is not yet necessary.

"SAMPLE random values y, alpha0 <- {0, . . . , q-1}

SET alpha1 = alpha0 + 1

COMPUTE

1. g1 = (g0)^y

2. h0 = (g0)^(alpha0)

3. h1 = (g1)^(alpha1)

SEND (g1,h0,h1) to S

Run the prover in ZKPOK_FROM_SIGMA with Sigma protocol SIGMA_DH. Use common input (g0,g1,h0,h1/g1) and private input alpha0."

Parameters:
channel -
dlog -
zkProver - used to prove the ZKPOK_FROM_SIGMA
random -
Returns:
the values calculated in the preprocess
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem during the serialization mechanism in the preprocess phase.
CheatAttemptException - if the receiver suspects that the sender is trying to cheat in the preprocess phase.
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem during the communication in the preprocess phase.
CommitValueException - can occur in case of ElGamal commitment scheme.
